verses.verse: Now <S%G3796>late<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2020>day<s%>, as it began to dawn <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> to <S%G2334>see<s%> the <S%G5028>sepulchre<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, and <S%G4334>came<s%> and rolled <S%G617>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1883>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> <S%G2397>appearance<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1742>raiment<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G5510>snow<s%>:
and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G5083>watchers<s%> did <S%G4579>quake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> dead <S%G3498>men<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, who hath been <S%G4717>crucified<s%>.

He <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>. <S%G1205>Come<s%>, <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2749>lay<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, and <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, He is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>lo<s%>, he goeth <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>; <S%G1563>there<s%> shall ye <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2400>lo<s%>, I have <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, and <S%G5143>ran<s%> to <S%G518>bring<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G518>word<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, All <S%G5463>hail<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4334>came<s%> and took <S%G2902>hold<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G565>depart<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, and <S%G2546>there<s%> shall they <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4198>while<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4198>going<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2892>guard<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, and <S%G518>told<s%> unto the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the things that were come to <S%G1096>pass<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%>, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> unto the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, Say <S%G3754>ye<s%>, <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, and <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> away <S%G2837>while<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G2837>slept<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G191>come<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%>'s <S%G191>ears<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> will <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> rid <S%G5209>you<s%> of <S%G275>care<s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%>, and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they were <S%G1321>taught<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> was <S%G1310>spread<s%> abroad <S%G3844>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, and continueth <S%G3360>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3101>the<s%> <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5021>appointed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G1365>doubted<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to them and <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> hath been <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

Go <S%G4198>ye<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, and make <S%G3100>disciples<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>, <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>:

teaching <S%G1321><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5083>observe<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>lo<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2250>always<s%>, even <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%>.
